title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 17 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 17 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me.
lineList.cn: 我的心灵消耗，我的日子灭尽。坟墓为我预备好了。

lineList.en: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?
lineList.cn: 真有戏笑我的在我这里，我眼常见他们惹动我。

lineList.en: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?
lineList.cn: 愿主拿凭据给我，自己为我作保。在你以外谁肯与我击掌呢。

lineList.en: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.
lineList.cn: 因你使他们心不明理，所以你必不高举他们。

lineList.en: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.
lineList.cn: 控告他的朋友，以朋友为可抢夺的，连他儿女的眼睛也要失明。

lineList.en: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.
lineList.cn: 神使我作了民中的笑谈。他们也吐唾沫在我脸上。

lineList.en: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow.
lineList.cn: 我的眼睛因忧愁昏花。我的百体好像影儿。

lineList.en: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.
lineList.cn: 正直人因此必惊奇。无辜的人，要兴起攻击不敬虔之辈。

lineList.en: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
lineList.cn: 然而，义人要持守所行的道。手洁的人要力上加力。

lineList.en: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.
lineList.cn: 至于你们众人，可以再来辩论吧。你们中间，我找不着一个智慧人。

lineList.en: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart.
lineList.cn: 我的日子已经过了。我的谋算，我心所想望的已经断绝。

lineList.en: They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness.
lineList.cn: 他们以黑夜为白昼，说，亮光近乎黑暗。

lineList.en: If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.
lineList.cn: 我若盼望阴间为我的房屋，若下榻在黑暗中，

lineList.en: I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister.
lineList.cn: 若对朽坏说，你是我的父。对虫说，你是我的母亲姊妹。

lineList.en: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?
lineList.cn: 这样，我的指望在那里呢。我所指望的谁能看见呢。

lineList.en: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.
lineList.cn: 等到安息在尘土中，这指望必下到阴间的门闩那里了。
